item.description:
***CRAFT BEER CREW EXCLUSIVE SUMMER BEER GARDEN PARTY!***

You're invited to attend our first-ever summer party, specifically organized for YOU, a member of the Craft Beer Crew - so that you can meet other craft beer drinkers and hang out at one of Boston's most popular beer patios, while you sample a featured summer and and much on food (while it lasts). Talk about a great way to wind down the weekend. Got a pal to bring? Great! It's a great way to spread the word about our active, growing group, while sharing the beer love.

So, what do you say? You in? If so, all it takes is a $12 "donation" per person that'll supply the food and featured beer sampling. It'll be fun!

*PLEASE NOTE* Each person who attends will be entered into a raffle to win something. What that something is... well, you'll just have to find out!

Will I see you there?

Cheers,
Alicia

P.S.> Location will be shared with members who RSVP and pay. (Yes, you must pay in advance, though you'll get your money back if you cancel within 24 hours of the event. If you have any questions, please email me.)
item.name: Our Summer Beer Garden Party
